### LLVMCountParamTypes() {#ga44fa41d22ed1f589b8202272f54aad77}

  prototype={<>unsigned LLVMCountParamTypes (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> FunctionTy)</>}>
Obtain the number of parameters this function accepts.

### LLVMFunctionType() {#ga8b0c32e7322e5c6c1bf7eb95b0961707}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMTypeRef LLVMFunctionType (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> ReturnType, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> &#42; ParamTypes, unsigned ParamCount, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga209de0bceb13179a973c6a45211617bd">LLVMBool</a> IsVarArg)</>}>
Obtain a function type consisting of a specified signature.

The function is defined as a tuple of a return Type, a list of parameter types, and whether the function is variadic.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l01411">1411</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l00764">764</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMGetParamTypes() {#ga83dd3a49a0f3f017f4233fc0d667bda2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LLVMGetParamTypes (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> FunctionTy, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> &#42; Dest)</>}>
Obtain the types of a function&#39;s parameters.

The Dest parameter should point to a pre-allocated array of <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> at least <a href="#ga44fa41d22ed1f589b8202272f54aad77">LLVMCountParamTypes()</a> large. On return, the first <a href="#ga44fa41d22ed1f589b8202272f54aad77">LLVMCountParamTypes()</a> entries in the array will be populated with <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> instances.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="FunctionTy">The function type to operate on.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Dest">Memory address of an array to be filled with result.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l01441">1441</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l00783">783</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
